title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Avionos is a digital consulting and solutions firm focused on the Connected Customer. We help companies create seamless, integrated experiences that result in enhanced customer relationships and increased loyalty. We deliver web, mobile and cross-platform solutions that work in concert with connected devices. Our expertise is in Marketing, Sales, and CRM.
Adapted UX designs into a functional and branded front-end tenant portal platform using Salesforce Experience Cloud and modern web development practices.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Managed a team of developers by mentoring junior resources and enforcing best practices within the Salesforce platform.
Revitalized legacy client software by building a high quality Salesforce solution to improve the client's outreach to potential volunteers.

title: Technical Consultant
description: Contracted at Fortune 500 company specializing in Front-End Development and Component-based frameworks.
